description:
present: fix get-to-end-of-line code in present's pattern matcher
The old code was wrong: it always advanced before checking
if we were already at end-of-line.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

There need to be tests all through here, but I'm not sure how to go
about it. Can we check this in and address that problem separately?
There is a lousy bug being fixed. I can talk testing with adg when he
returns.

-rob

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ba7df7d300f6&repo=talks ***

present: fix get-to-end-of-line code in present's pattern matcher
The old code was wrong: it always advanced before checking
if we were already at end-of-line.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
